item.title: CVE-2023-3031|2024-08-02T06:41:04.192Z -- webbax -- king-avis
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname leads to a Path Traversal vulnerability in the module King-Avis for Prestashop, allowing a user knowing the download token to read arbitrary local files.This issue affects King-Avis: before 17.3.15.
